title: Embedded Software Dev.
Description: Developed software for sensing and actuation, and led embedded software developments for ultrasonics sensors.
Bullets: Developed thermal protection model for M3/Y steering column.
Developed ultrasonics sensing technologies to support autopilot in embedded controllers.
Developed many automation toolsets needed for the developments. (Python, C)
Raised issues and improved the driver proﬁle recall interface for Model 3 Seats with a full coverage of unit tests
Coordinated with multiple teams to develop the interface to allow a real-time coordination between the ﬁrst and second row seats on the Model X
Developed various toolsets for data analysis and system modeling to assist multiple developments (Python)

title: Firmware Dev.
Description: Developed an unique shape detection algorithm, GUI debugging tools, and core firmware of ShadowSense (modular) touch screen for large scale video wall.
Bullets: Improved performance of the ﬁrmware and developed a unique and adaptive algorithm (C++) to recognize polygon shapes for multi-touch ShadowSense touchscreens in realtime over 60Hz in all form factor

Devised useful analysis tools (Excel, VBA, Python) and a real-time sensor data visualizing application (C#, C++, Unity), which minimized time and eﬀorts spent on debugging and testing by over 60% (The visualizer has also being used for conference demos to showcase complex operations behind the scenes)

title: AR Software Dev.
Description: Worked on a state-of-the-art real-time AR project (HoloLens, UWP, OpenGL, OpenCV, C++)
Bullets: Created a state-of-the-art real-time AR project and also conducted various R&D in CV and ML
Developed a variety of evaluation tools (C++, OpenGL, Python) for multi-camera synchronization and networking
Implemented custom calibration and point-cloud rendering for multiple RGB-D cameras

title: Jack of all robots
Description: Currently working on cool exoskeletons for hospital rehabs for injured and disabled kids.
Bullets: Built medical pediatric exoskeletons for children with walking diﬃculties & Brought back a smile to many families

Developed a robust full stack software system that covers from ﬁrmware (C, FreeRTOS, Cortex M4 & AVR), middleware (ROS & ROS_Control, Linux Environment), debugging tools (Python), and Android applications (C, C++, Java, ROS Java), providing a seamless and comfortable rehabilitation experience
Conceived a new control system allowing patients to initiate steps as they please & Optimized application by 50%

title: Robotics Engineer
Description: Built a Mars Rover robot. Specifically, worked on hardware design of science modules, firmware, and computer vision.
Bullets: Worked on mechanical and computer vision systems for an autonomous Mars Rover robot

title: Team Lead
Description: Leading a 20-person team for an international autonomous robot racing competition for the year 2018 & 2019.
Bullets: Leading and managing a team of 20 students, developing a fully autonomous mobile robot that is capable of maneuvering through obstacles, lanes, and traﬃc signs in high speed on rough terrains (Jetson TX2, ZED, M4)
Conducting mechanical, electrical and software system designs for the robot (SolidWorks, ROS, C++, C)
